remarks: Deduce equality of a relation and an ordered-pair class builder. Compare ~ abbi2dv .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)
statement:
opabbi2dv.1 $e |- Rel A $.
opabbi2dv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( <. x , y >. e. A <-> ps ) ) $.
opabbi2dv $p |- ( ph -> A = { <. x , y >. | ps } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ph x y $.
